greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Binary weight of A304083.
link: Antti Karttunen, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..16383
Index entries for sequences related to binary expansion of n
formula: For all n >= 0, abs(a(n+1)-a(n)) = A000120(A304083(n+1) XOR A304083(n)), where XOR is a bitwise exclusive or, A003987.
program: (PARI) A304089(n) = hammingweight(A304083(n)); \\ Needs also code from A304083.
results.author: _Antti Karttunen_, May 06 2018
